comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.7.3) Gecko/20041030 Firefox/0.10.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.7.3) Gecko/20041030 Firefox/0.10.1

The new Search in Page funktion does Not work.
Hightlight works, but Find Next and find Previous do not work.
The JavaScript Error is:
Error: uncaught exception: [Exception... "Cannot modify properties of a
WrappedNative"  nsresult: "0x80570034 (NS_ERROR_XPC_CANT_MODIFY_PROP_ON_WN)" 
location: "JS frame :: chrome://browser/content/browser.js :: toggleLinkFocus ::
line 396"  data: no]

Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce:
1.Press Ctrl+f or select the Menu Option "Find in Page"
2.Enter Searchword
3.Press "Find Next"

Actual Results:  
It does not search, but genereates a JavaScript Error

Expected Results:  
It should select the next ocurrence of the word, or tell me, that the word is
not found.
comments.creator: allo@laxu.de
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.7.3) Gecko/20041030 Firefox/0.10.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.7.3) Gecko/20041030 Firefox/0.10.1

The new Search in Page funktion does Not work.
Hightlight works, but Find Next and find Previous do not work.
The JavaScript Error is:
Error: uncaught exception: [Exception... "Cannot modify properties of a
WrappedNative"  nsresult: "0x80570034 (NS_ERROR_XPC_CANT_MODIFY_PROP_ON_WN)" 
location: "JS frame :: chrome://browser/content/browser.js :: toggleLinkFocus ::
line 396"  data: no]

Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce:
1.Press Ctrl+f or select the Menu Option "Find in Page"
2.Enter Searchword
3.Press "Find Next"

Actual Results:  
It does not search, but genereates a JavaScript Error

Expected Results:  
It should select the next ocurrence of the word, or tell me, that the word is
not found.
comments.author: allo@laxu.de

comments.raw_text:
it was a compile mistake.
i'm sorry
